casebody.data:
WOOD CTY. BAR ASSN.
v.
DRIFTMYER 2018-0811 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 10, 2019

DISCIPLINARY CASES

On respondent's response to this court's April 8, 2019 show-cause order. No action shall be taken at this time, provided that respondent enters into a payment plan with the attorney general after this matter is referred for collection.
